articles.author: Evan Semones
articles.title: Esper approves housing for up to 1,000 evacuated from coronavirus-affected areas
articles.description: The statement also said that evacuees will be monitored for 14 days and will be transported to a local hospital if they show symptoms of the potentially deadly virus.
articles.content:
U.S. Defense Secretary Mark Esper | Jeon Heon-Kyun-Pool/Getty Images
The Pentagon is preparing to provide housing for as many as 1,000 people who may have to be quarantined after returning to the U.S. from areas affected by the coronavirus outbreak.

articles.author: Cissy Zhou | South China Morning Post
articles.title: New coronavirus deaths and cases in China reach record daily highs
articles.description: Confirmed cases rise to 11,791 nationally; death toll hits 259.
articles.content:
Authorities in Chinas coronavirus epicenter of Hubei province reported 45 new deaths from the illness and 1,347 new confirmed cases on Saturday both daily record highs.
Of the newly reported deaths in Hubei, 33 were in Wuhan, the provinces capital and a majo… [+1837 chars]
